thread.title: MUM DEMANDS ORANGES FOR ABSENT DAUGHTER DURING CNY
thread.title_full: MUM DEMANDS ORANGES FOR ABSENT DAUGHTER DURING CNY

author: farhan
title: MUM DEMANDS ORANGES FOR ABSENT DAUGHTER DURING CNY
text:
MUM DEMANDS ORANGES FOR ABSENT DAUGHTER DURING CNY   
Dear A.S.S. Editor Advertisement 
Just before Chinese New Year, my student was not in class. So I gave out two oranges to everyone in the class except her. 
The next day, I received a cal from the student's mother. She requested that I deliver the oranges to her home. 
Why so calculative one? Just remember, your children will follow your example, so, set good examples to them to ensure they turn out ok. This case, i really don't know what to say 
Patricia 
A.S.S. Contributor
